flawed_nl_solution:
When he gave 40 seashells to his friends, Ali had 180-40= <<180-40=140>>140 seashells.
When he gave another 30 seashells to his brothers, he had 140-30 = <<140-30=110>>110 seashells
He also sold half of the seashells, a total of 1/2*110 = <<1/2*110=220/1>>220/1 seashells
He was left with 110-220/1= <<110-220/1=-110>>-110 seashells

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 55, not 220/1. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
